member.summary: The right-click menu to be displayed.

member.name: T:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.PageTypes
member.summary: This enum should be shadowed at instance level and contain the actual page types that are contained in the DataContext

member.name: P:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.Nodes
member.summary: Returns The hierarchical structure that represents the Tree of Pages. Nodes contain Pages and other nodes.

member.name: P:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.Pages
member.summary: The non-hierarchical list of Pages that are hosted by this class. The first entry is assumed to represent the Master DataContext that manipulates the main record.

member.name: M:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.CreatePagedNode(System.String,System.Func{CDBNETBiz.IChildDataContext},System.Boolean,CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.PageTypes)
member.summary: Adds a PagedNode class to the PagedDictionary property. If a PageID is not specified then a new PageId will be assigned and returned.
member.param: The text that will be displayed in the Container to represent this node
The function that will be executed to instantiate the DataContext
The ID by which the Page will be referenced in the future. This is expected to be one of the PageTypes enum.
member.returns: The PageID assigned to the Page. If none was passed as a parameter then a new one is assigned.

member.name: P:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.MasterPage
member.summary: Returns the PagedNode instance for the top-level record. The top-level record is the record that all other records are dependent of.
member.remarks: The MasterPage property relies on the sequence that all PagedNodes were added to the dictionary. It is assumed that the first node is also added first in the nodes dictionary. The MasterPage will also need to have a valid DataContext property.

member.name: P:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.SelectedRow
member.summary: The row from the DataTable that is currently selected

member.name: M:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.NotifyPages(System.Object,CDBNETCL.ChildPropertyNotifyArgs)
member.summary: Sends a message to all PagedNode objects hosted in this TreeViewDataContext to notify them of a property change

member.name: M:CDBNETBiz.PagedTreeViewDataContext.PagedNode.ConstructDataContext
member.summary: If a DataContext constructor has been given then this method executes it and initialises the DataContext property with the return value from the constructor
member.returns: True if a DataContext was generated from the Constructor

member.name: M:CDBNETBiz.WorkstreamContainerDataContext.IsPageType(System.Enum,CDBNETBiz.WorkstreamContainerDataContext.PageTypes)
member.summary: Returns True if the generic Enum value is equal to the specified PageType
member.param: The PageType that you wish to compare the targetValue to
member.returns: True if the types are equal, otherwise False.
member.remarks: This method is useful when process the OnChildNotifyReceived event as one of its properties is the Enum equivalent of the PageType that sent the notification
